## PropertyDecoratorManager.isDecorated() method

Check if a property is decorated

**Signature:**

```typescript
isDecorated(target: unknown, propertyKey: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  target | unknown | Target object |
|  propertyKey | string | Property name |

**Returns:**

boolean

true if decorated, false otherwise
